item.title: [RS2] Teleporter - My First Script
item.dc:creator: @Thrice Thrice
item.description:
@Thrice wrote:

Well this is the first script I have made for SCAR I started it a long time ago and finally decided to finish it plz post feedback…

[code]program Teleporter;
Var
ks,cast:integer;
vc,lc,fc,cc,ac,wc,tc:boolean;
frmDesign : TForm;
Killswitch : TLabel;
Varrock,Lumbridge,Falador,Camelot,Ardougne,WatchTower,Trollheim : TCheckBox;
Ok : TButton;
KillswitchBox : TEdit;
{.include RSCI.txt}

procedure UberTeleporterMenu;
begin
frmDesign := CreateForm;
frmDesign.Left := 250;
frmDesign.Top := 130;
frmDesign.Width := 264;
frmDesign.Height := 288;
frmDesign.Caption := ‘Teleporter v1.0’;
frmDesign.Color := clBtnFace;
frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
frmDesign.Visible := False;
frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
Killswitch := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Killswitch.Parent := frmDesign;
Killswitch.Left := 140;
Killswitch.Top := 172;
Killswitch.Width := 43;
Killswitch.Height := 13;
Killswitch.Caption := ‘Killswitch’;
Varrock := TCheckBox.Create(frmDesign);
Varrock.Parent := frmDesign;
Varrock.Left := 16;
Varrock.Top := 48;
Varrock.Width := 97;
Varrock.Height := 17;
Varrock.Caption := ‘Varrock’;
Varrock.Checked := False;
Varrock.TabOrder := 8;
Lumbridge := TCheckBox.Create(frmDesign);
Lumbridge.Parent := frmDesign;
Lumbridge.Left := 16;
Lumbridge.Top := 68;
Lumbridge.Width := 97;
Lumbridge.Height := 17;
Lumbridge.Caption := ‘Lumbridge’;
Lumbridge.Checked := False;
Lumbridge.TabOrder := 9;
Falador := TCheckBox.Create(frmDesign);
Falador.Parent := frmDesign;
Falador.Left := 16;
Falador.Top := 88;
Falador.Width := 97;
Falador.Height := 17;
Falador.Caption := ‘Falador’;
Falador.Checked := False;
Falador.TabOrder := 10;
Camelot := TCheckBox.Create(frmDesign);
Camelot.Parent := frmDesign;
Camelot.Left := 16;
Camelot.Top := 108;
Camelot.Width := 97;
Camelot.Height := 17;
Camelot.Caption := ‘Camelot’;
Camelot.Checked := False;
Camelot.TabOrder := 11;
Ardougne := TCheckBox.Create(frmDesign);
Ardougne.Parent := frmDesign;
Ardougne.Left := 16;
Ardougne.Top := 128;
Ardougne.Width := 97;
Ardougne.Height := 17;
Ardougne.Caption := ‘Ardougne’;
Ardougne.Checked := False;
Ardougne.TabOrder := 12;
WatchTower := TCheckBox.Create(frmDesign);
WatchTower.Parent := frmDesign;
WatchTower.Left := 16;
WatchTower.Top := 148;
WatchTower.Width := 97;
WatchTower.Height := 17;
WatchTower.Caption := ‘WatchTower’;
WatchTower.Checked := False;
WatchTower.TabOrder := 13;
Trollheim := TCheckBox.Create(frmDesign);
Trollheim.Parent := frmDesign;
Trollheim.Left := 16;
Trollheim.Top := 168;
Trollheim.Width := 97;
Trollheim.Height := 17;
Trollheim.Caption := ‘Trollheim’;
Trollheim.Checked := False;
Trollheim.TabOrder := 14;
KillswitchBox := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
KillswitchBox.Parent := frmDesign;
KillswitchBox.Left := 190;
KillswitchBox.Top := 168;
KillswitchBox.Width := 60;
KillswitchBox.Height := 21;
KillswitchBox.TabOrder := 15;
KillswitchBox.Text := ‘0’;
Ok := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Ok.Parent := frmDesign;
Ok.Left := 88;
Ok.Top := 216;
Ok.Width := 75;
Ok.Height := 25;
Ok.Caption := ‘Ok’;
Ok.ModalResult := 1;
Ok.TabOrder := 15;
end;

procedure SafeInitFormUT;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘UberTeleporterMenu’, v);
end;

procedure ShowFormModalUT;
begin
frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

procedure SafeShowFormModalUT;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘ShowFormModalUT’, v);
end;

procedure loadUTmenu;
begin
SafeInitFormUT;
SafeShowFormModalUT;
end;

Procedure UTmenu(sender: TObject);
begin
loadUTmenu;
end;

Procedure Teleport;
begin
writeln(‘Teleporter V1.0 By Thrice’);
Wait(2000+random(500));
MMouse(739,187,10,10);
Wait(1000+random(500));
Mouse(739,187,10,10,true);// Clicks Magic Tab
cast:=0;
ks:= strtoint(KillswitchBox.Text)
vc:= Varrock.Checked = true;
lc:= Lumbridge.Checked = true;
fc:= Falador.Checked = true;
cc:= Camelot.Checked = true;
ac:= Ardougne.Checked = true;
wc:= Watchtower.Checked = true;
tc:= Trollheim.Checked = true;
repeat
x:=0;
x:=1+(random(800));
if((x >= 2)and(x <= 200)and(vc))then
begin
Wait(1000+random(500));
MMouse(707,249,7,5);
Wait(1000+random(500));
Mouse(707,249,7,5,true);
Wait(2500+random(2500));
cast:=cast+1;
end;
if((x >= 201)and(x <= 300)and(lc))then
begin
Wait(1000+random(500));
MMouse(611,274,7,5);
Wait(1000+random(500));
Mouse(611,274,7,5,true);
Wait(2500+random(2500));
cast:=cast+1;
end;
if((x >= 301)and(x <= 400)and(fc))then
begin
Wait(1000+random(500));
MMouse(685,274,7,5);
Wait(1000+random(500));
Mouse(685,274,7,5,true);
Wait(2500+random(2500));
cast:=cast+1;
end;
if((x >= 401)and(x <= 500)and(cc))then
begin
Wait(1000+random(500));
MMouse(612,297,7,5);
Wait(1000+random(500));
Mouse(612,297,7,5,true);
Wait(2500+random(2500));
cast:=cast+1;
end;
if((x >= 501)and(x <= 600)and(ac))then
begin
Wait(1000+random(500));
MMouse(587,323,7,5);
Wait(1000+random(500));
Mouse(587,323,7,5,true);
Wait(2500+random(2500));
cast:=cast+1;
end;
if((x >= 601)and(x <= 700)and(wc))then
begin
Wait(1000+random(500));
MMouse(707,323,7,5);
Wait(1000+random(500));
Mouse(707,323,7,5,true);
Wait(2500+random(2500));
cast:=cast+1;
end;
if((x >= 701)and(x <= 801)and(tc))then
begin
Wait(1000+random(500));
MMouse(684,346,7,5);
Wait(1000+random(500));
Mouse(684,346,7,5,true);
Wait(2500+random(2500));
cast:=cast+1;
end;
if((x >= 2)and(x <= 200)and not(vc))then
begin
Wait(1000+random(500));
end;
if((x >= 201)and(x <= 300)and not(lc))then
begin
Wait(1000+random(500));
end;
if((x >= 301)and(x <= 400)and not(fc))then
begin
Wait(1000+random(500));
end;
if((x >= 401)and(x <= 500)and not(cc))then
begin
Wait(1000+random(500));
end;
if((x >= 501)and(x <= 600)and not(ac))then
begin
Wait(1000+random(500));
end;
if((x >= 601)and(x <= 700)and not(wc))then
begin
Wait(1000+random(500));
end;
if((x >= 701)and(x <= 801)and not(tc))then
begin
Wait(1000+random(500));
end;
until(cast=ks);
TerminateScript;
end;

begin
LoadLibrary(‘AOL Instant Messenger - Signed Off’)
loadUTmenu;
repeat
Teleport;
until((cast=ks) or (cast>ks));
end.
[/code]

Now I never added any anti-randoms but plz rate

Read full topic
